raw_body:
KEEGEL – CHARLES OSWALD RICHARD (RICHIE) passed away peacefully. Beloved husband of Rita,​ loving father of Maxwell and Marguerite,​ grandfather of Melinda and Nadine,​ father-in-law of Nigel Coggins,​ son of the late Mr & Mrs Hugh Keegel. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella on Friday,​ 17th May 2024 from 9 a.m. Funeral service at 4 p.m. followed by burial at Kanatte,​ Borella (Roman Catholic Section).
033067
